Incoterms the internationally agreed terms of 
a sale under which most trade is governed are

called Incoterms some of the most common 
terms include fo B or free onboard means

the seller is responsible for the goods 
until they are loaded the seller must

pay all costs related to getting 
the goods to port and on to ship

CFR or cost and freight means that a quoted 
price includes the cost of goods and transport

charges to the destination port CIF or cost 
insurance and freight means that a quoted

price includes the cost of goods insurance 
and transportation to the destination port

duty customs is the authority or organization that

customs officials have the right to board and

a customs broker is a person or business that
